name: Brandon Janeak Prototypes
description:
Game One: Seasons Game - A proposed(not currently functional)elemental platformer in which the platforms come and go based on the current season, based on the background colour.

Game Two: Astrofield Scramble - As an astronaut drifting through a asteroid field, you much control the centre of gravity in order to traverse the field while avoiding being pummelled by asteroids in the process.

Game Three: S.A.V.A.C - Settle conflicts and get back at your friends in a single-screen-multiplayer drag racing game that tests your reaction time along with your ability to fend off interference from your opponent.

Game Four: Gusty Plane - Use your voice to control the wind and guide a fragile paper plane through obstacles in this tangible media re-imagining of Flappy Bird.
